description: Cut from lightweight cotton-blend jersey that is made with recycled polyester and has a heathered look. Double RL logo and bucking bronco printed at the front using multiple techniques. Heavily laundered for a sun-faded, vintage appearance.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27.5" front body length, an 18.5" shoulder, and a 40" chest.
"RRL & Co. Est 93 Ralph Lauren" and a bucking bronco printed at the front.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
